attributes.action: make excessive interest rates illegal as loan sharking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any annualised interest rate more than 12% above the Bank of England base rate to be illegal as the act of loan sharking. This will hold whether it refers to door to door loans to the poor traditionally held to be loan sharking, as well as to credit cards, store cards and hire purchase agreements. 12% is more than enough in any loan to make a clear profit. Anyone individual guilty of loan sharking to be subject to a custodial sentance. Any business guilty of loan sharking to to face draconian fines and if repeated revocation of licence to operate.
